title: Chicago Syndicate
description: A romantic suspense centered around the Chicagoan Cosa the Chicago Syndicate. Love, lies, and betrayal poison the relationships of the members.This Limited Edition box set contains all four published novels from the Chicago Syndicate For Fallon (#1)For Luca (#2)For Adriano (#3)For Cam (#4)For Logan (#5) - coming in 2016Book 1 and 2: Luca and Fallon's storyBook 3 and 4: Adriano and Cam's story - book 3 can be read as a standalone, but you'll read some spoilers from the previous books.*Mature content
author: Soraya Naomi
